cases.text: For Munich please contact admission@mgt.tum.de.
For Heilbronn please contact admission_heilbronn@mgt.tum.de.
For Straubing please contact for the Bachelor program bsmt@cs.tum.de and for the Master program msmt@cs.tum.de.

title: Going abroad (for enrolled TUM School of Management students)

cases.text: If you want to get information about the possibilities to go abroad or you are an outgoing TUM SoM exchange student and have an inquiry or you have questions concerning a credit transfer and recognition of international modules please contact outgoing@mgt.tum.de or click here.
Please contact incoming@mgt.tum.de or click here.
